definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
mass incident (PRC term for incidents of social unrest, including rioting, melees and petition campaigns)

sentences.english: Instead of being judgmental, we too should be accepting of sexuality in the later years.
sentences.chinese: 我們也應該接受年紀大的人的性事，而不應該去批判。

sentences.english: Here are ten bizarre facts you probably didn't know about sex in the animal kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 下面就是動物王國裏你恐怕不會知道的十大詭異性事。

sentences.english: She was talking about avoiding sexual temptation with her boyfriend.
sentences.chinese: 她談論着怎樣和她的男朋友避免性事。

sentences.english: I told him that he had nearly caused a bad accident.
sentences.chinese: 我對他說他差一點造成一起惡性事故。

sentences.english: Many serious incidents happen in schools are caused by the students who are emotionally out of control.
sentences.chinese: 學校許多惡性事件是在學生情緒失控狀態下發生的。

sentences.english: In a series of vicious incidents, Sun Weiming case and Hu Bin case are the most sensational cases.
sentences.chinese: 在一系列惡性事件中，數孫偉銘案和胡斌案最爲轟動。

sentences.english: The incident happened on Hazeldene Avenue, Kenton, in the early hours of Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 這一惡性事件發生在週日凌晨肯頓的黑茲爾登大道上。

sentences.english: Sex is worth having. Chocolate's worth having.
Investigation shows, folk usurious the malignant event has occurred to recover.
sentences.chinese: 調查顯示，民間追討高利貸的惡性事件已有發生。

definition: euphemism for sexual intercourse/to go to bed with sb
bed and bamboo sleeping mat/(fig.) bed as a place for intimacy
the pleasure of close intimacy in a couple (idiom)/sexual intercourse
